Name: Roulette Simulator
About the game: Roulette Simulator presents players with the greatest modern Roulette gambling simulation. Experience the highs and the lows in real-time as you try to beat the roulette wheel during the intensity of each spin! 3D Roulette Simulation Themed Roulette Wheels Realistic Wheel and Ball Physics. Experience Roulette in a 3D Physics-based simulation engine! Every spin matters! Every outcome presents intense moments and dramatic possibilities! Practice betting strategies to master the roulette wheel and earn great profits! Build your bankroll and move up the all-time Steam Leaderboards with every winning bet. Earn Roulette Achievements! (Steam Achievements integration) Steam Features Steam Leaderboards. Steam Achievements.
